segments.text: I see an adult woman standing right in front of the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing a plate with a dish towel, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is fixed solely on that plate, not on anything else around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in the growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing that she shows no reaction whatsoever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is perfectly neutral, as if nothing out of the ordinary is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she feels the water soaking her shoe, or if she's just completely zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can anyone be so unaware of such an obvious issue?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel a bit angry, to be honest, seeing her so oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of detachment is truly remarkable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is going to be so surprised when she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical in its absurdity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels like a strange play.
segments.speaker: PAR
